TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CachingHint extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定是否快取並排顯示筆刷物件。

span.span: Specifies whether to cache tiled brush objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不會快取的呈現的內容和物件。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在靜態內容和場景中的筆刷使用都不會變更所在的情況下，快取的並非十分有用，因為它可以節省視訊記憶體。In static scenarios where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 當具有靜態內容的筆刷會在非靜態方法的預設行為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]是重新呈現整個內容的筆刷每個畫面，即使內容不變亦同。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render the entire content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，將會發生此靜態或旋轉 3D 物件的介面對應。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新轉譯靜態內容會對效能產生負面影響。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 藉由設定附加屬性上快取的筆刷，您可以提升效能的並排顯示筆刷物件的快取的版本。By setting the attached property on the brush to Cache, you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 並屬性的值是相對大小值，判斷何時應該重新產生物件，因為變更小數位數。The and property values are relative size values that determine when the object should be regenerated due to changes in scale. 例如，藉由設定屬性為 2.0 時，快取只需要重新產生它的大小超過兩次目前的快取的大小。For example, by setting the property to 2.0, the cache for the only needs to be regenerated when its size exceeds twice the size of the current cache. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的快取提示選項。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet3)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.CachingHint Cache = int32(1)

summary.span: 使用 設定所指定的快取提示，快取螢幕外緩衝區的並排顯示筆刷物件。

span.span: Cache the tiled brush objects in an off-screen buffer, using the caching hints specified by the settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.CachingHint Unspecified = int32(0)

summary.span: 未指定任何的快取提示。
